t: Fairfield by Marriott - Wikipedia
s: February 17, 2025 - The brand was named Fairfield Inn & Suites between 1987–2019. Marriott International developed the concept for Fairfield Inn in the late 1980s to compete with other economy limited-service (ELS) hotel chains (below $45 a night) like Days Inn, Hampton Inn, and Red Roof Inn.
